title: Jim Cramer says the banking crisis is fighting inflation for Powell and the Fed
description: CNBC's Jim Cramer on Thursday said the banking crisis is fighting inflation and the Fed no longer needs to take action.

title: China would be among first paid under GOP debt limit plan, Treasury Secretary Yellen says
description: A GOP plan to pay off certain debts to avoid default instead of passing a debt ceiling bill is a "dangerous idea," said Yellen.

title: Treasury Secretary Yellen says not all uninsured deposits will be protected in future bank failures
description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen sought to reassure markets and lawmakers that the government will protect U.S. bank deposits amid a rash of bank failures.

title: One year after the first rate hike, the Fed stands at policy crossroads
description: The Fed in some ways is both closer and further away from its goals when it first started raising rates.

title: Microsoft tries to justify AI's tendency to give wrong answers by saying they're 'usefully wrong'
description: Current AI technologies like ChatGPT can often produce inaccurate responses, which presents a problem as Microsoft adds AI to Word, Excel, and other products.

title: A group of banks are in talks to deposit $30 billion in First Republic, sources say
description: The news comes after First Republic's stock has been pummeled in recent days, sparked by the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank.

title: France's President Macron overrides parliament to pass retirement age bill
description: French President Emmanuel Macron invoked special constitutional powers to push the bill through.

title: Bank shares rebound off lows on report big banks coming to the aid of First Republic
description: The collapse of Silicon Valley Bank last Friday has left investors scrambling to identify other regional banks that have similar balance sheet issues.

title: 'The weakest links are cracking': Investors consider possible Credit Suisse contagion
description: Even before the shock collapse of two U.S. banks, Credit Suisse had faced a slew of problems, including money laundering charges and spying allegations.

title: Cocaine production is at its highest level on record, UN says
description: Despite continued efforts by law enforcement to crack down on cocaine use, global demand for the drug has only grown.

title: European Central Bank hikes rates despite market mayhem, pledges support if needed
description: Some market players questioned whether President Christine Lagarde would proceed with a hike, given recent shocks in the banking sector.

title: UK bans TikTok on government devices following U.S. move
description: The United Kingdom on Thursday announced plans to ban the Chinese-owned video app TikTok on government devices.

title: TikTok confirms the U.S. has threatened ban if Chinese parent ByteDance doesn't sell stake
description: The U.S. has a number of concerns about TikTok and has maintained the Chinese-owned app presents a national security risk.

title: Baidu shares drop to 8-week lows after company reveals ChatGPT rival
description: Chinese tech company Baidu gave the public a peek Thursday at what its Chinese-language ChatGPT alternative can do, while warning of its imperfections.

title: Chinese ride-hailing giant Didi plans expansion after Beijing's crackdown on the firm ends
description: The Beijing-headquartered company said in an online statement that it plans to work with partners in 2023 to launch more diversified products and services.

title: HSBC bought Silicon Valley Bank UK in record time — here's how events unfolded
description: The CEO of HSBC UK said he would not have guessed — just a few days beforehand — that it would be buying Silicon Valley Bank UK.

title: Credit Suisse shares soar 30% on Swiss National Bank loan announcement
Here are the world's best airports for 2023
description: Singapore's Changi Airport has been named the "world's best airport" for a record 12th time.

title: Saudi National Bank says panic over Credit Suisse is 'unwarranted'
description: "It's panic, a little bit of panic. I believe completely unwarranted, whether it be for Credit Suisse or for the entire market," he said on CNBC's "Capital Connection."

title: CNBC Daily Open: Credit Suisse brings the banking crisis to Europe
description: Credit Suisse tanked after its largest investor said it couldn't provide more financial assistance. Banks in the U.S. and Europe were slammed on the news.

title: China sees record 7.7 million applicants for 200,000 government jobs
description: Government jobs are typically regarded as stable and prestigious in China, especially since young people's unemployment has soared to record highs.

title: Southeast Asia VC firms could see a larger impact from SVB fallout than startups
description: Some VC firms could face challenges in finding another bank that offers the same product offering as Silicon Valley Bank.

title: Credit Suisse to borrow up to about $54 billion from Swiss National Bank
description: Credit Suisse announced it will be borrowing up to 50 billion Swiss francs ($53.68 billion) from the Swiss National Bank under a covered loan facility and a short-term liquidity facility.
